title: LF Friendly team to climb out of Bronze
body:
Hey so I'm looking for a team and friends to play some ranked to climb out of bronze. I was placed in B2 but have fallen to B5 slowly mostly due to afk'ers, trolls and straight up flamers. 
Just looking for some positive people to learn with. 
I main mid and top but can also support and jungle well enough to not feed.

replies.body: i'm supp and jg main (i can play all support). But overall i can play most roles decently. I'm Silver 5 now (climb from b2) and i dont mind helping people to climb.

{{champion:74}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} _im interested hav'nt ranked this year for very same reason.  I have all champs on this account  :)
_

support main with jungle and adc back ups, was silver 4 last year but this year i cannot climb at all for basically the same reason, people are just getting too toxic nowadays, hmu if you wanna play sometime
-ThreshXG

i was in bronze one  just about to hit silver 5 but new season started and been in bronze 5 coz of afk'ers and feeders i main mid top and sup {{champion:238}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:26}}  and there's my champ pool...
Hey I play jungle, adc and mid. always happy to play. Hit me up! PatrikkStar

I was placed in bronze 2, and at some point i'm probably going to fall due to the exact same reasons. I'll be willing to team with you.

I can play top, jg, sup and once I buy jhin: adc
I was silver 2 and now I'm bronze 1 just because of that reason, add me if u want I can play every roles but top and I can only play on Saturday.
Hit me up now if you want I main top and jg
